benchmark_details.name: MT-Eval (Multi-Turn Capabilities Evaluation)
benchmark_details.overview: MT-Eval is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate multi-turn conversational abilities in large language models, measuring their coherence and adaptability in real-world dialogue scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective is to systematically evaluate and understand large language models' capabilities in multi-turn conversations across diverse applications.

data.source: Constructed from existing datasets and augmented with GPT-4 generated queries and dialogues.
data.annotation: Manually reviewed and revised for quality assurance.

methodology.calculation: Scores are derived from user interactions and evaluations conducted through human raters and automated assessments using GPT-4.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in multi-turn dialogue capabilities.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4 scored highest among models evaluated.
